text: Penicillium pseudostromaticum is an anamorph species of fungus in the genus Penicillium which was isolated from the mushroom Piptoporus betulinus which grew on the tree Betula populifolia.ATCCGlobal Catalogue of MicroorganismsDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * * == References == pseudostromaticum Category:Fungi described in 1970
title: Penicillium pseudostromaticum
